Row.Text: Allows you to construct the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Clockwork Magnolia[ENDCOLOR], a powerful wonder that provides [ICON_GOLD] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]gold[ENDCOLOR] bonuses to trade routes and ends all wars you are involved in.
Would that all things could be reliable as clockwork.
Allows you to establish an additional 2 trade routes. Also provides +3 [ICON_GOLD] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]gold[ENDCOLOR] per trade route.
It is a delicate balance between law and trade. A balance struck by gold.
Reduces the pressure exerted by foreign religions and allows you to establish an additional trade route.
On this holiest ground we pay homage to all held sacrosanct.
Unlocks powerful naval units and buildings essential to training and maintaining a large navy.
Before this, we called a single ship a formation.

Allows the construction of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Inquisition Chapterhouses[ENDCOLOR], which provide [ICON_PEACE] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]faith[ENDCOLOR] and increase the pressure exerted by majority religions. Also allows the purchasing of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Inquisitors[ENDCOLOR] with faith.
Confessions are best signed in blood.

Allows you to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Theors' Academies[ENDCOLOR], boosting a city's [ICON_RESEARCH] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]science[ENDCOLOR] output, and giving bonus [ICON_PEACE] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]faith[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_RESEARCH] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]science[ENDCOLOR] in cities where trade routes originate. Also boosts the range of naval trade routes.
That which is beyond our capacity to study is yet an opportunity to learn.
Allows workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Powder Keg Traps[ENDCOLOR], powerful defensive improvements that explode and damage invading military units.
And Svestans claim there is no such thing as magic.
Removes the effects of foreign religious pressure from your cities, as well as increasing the pressure your religion exerts abroad.
I am nothing. I am everything.
Foreign religions exert {1_ForeignReligionModifier}% {2_MoreOrLess} pressure in your cities.
Foreign religions exert no pressure in cities you own.
Your religion exerts {1_Modifier}% {2_MoreOrLess} pressure in foreign cities.
